So I feel that through my book … I can also aspire to teach Torah in vivid ways>/blockquote>
Echoes of Haim Sabbato’s writing. BeAfapei Sha’har can be seen as a running commentary on parts of Massechet Berakhot, and yet it doesn’t feel preachy in the least. Just a pleasure to read and take in the beautiful language.
